title: Mini Flashcards
description: Frustrated by the amount of ads on Quizlet, I decided to create my own flashcard application. Through this project, I learned about SQL databases, authentification with Supabase, and Amazon's Simple Email Service (SES).

title: Dolce Sicilia Italian Bakery Website
summary: A wesbite for a local bakery.
description: I created this for a bakery in Wheatridge, Colorado. He requested a place to put information about his bakery as well as a photo gallery. Using Vercel Blob Storage, I created a gallery that he could upload images to. This was my first time optimizing SEO and I was very pleased to achive thousands of visits and impressions.
